Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: PM7   token  –  is a digital token based on the ERC-20 standard which is awarded to backers who supports the ICO of PM7 platform and purchased premium accounts with different number of events. The PM7 tokens perform infrastructure functions and they are the identifier, the unit of measurement   of   PM7   events,   and   quantity   of   PM7   events   per   month   that   the   backer receives by purchasing events during the ICO.  3,500,000,000 – is the approximate number of Internet users. 1,000,000,000 – is the number of PM7 in the system. 3.5B: 1B = 3.5 users. There are 3.5 users for each PM7 in our system. For example, if you buy $100 of our PM7 events during the first phase (and receive PM7 tokens), then taking into account bonuses: 100$: 0.05 = (2000 PM7 + 800 PM7 (+40%)) x 3.5 users = 9800 users can be involved for $100, which generate revenue in the form of bonuses. According to our calculator, 9800 friends can approximately generate revenue of  +/- $19,000. At the same time, the system and   its owners will receive $7200. In other words, for every $1 spent, you may theoretically receive income up to $72. This is considering the fact that on the first level will be 7 friends, but you can involve much larger (see calculator). So $72 is repeatedly multiplied. And this is only one product and level, and we have an innovative multilayer and multi-level blockchain technology of MLM distribution. And there will be thousands of products!!!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform

I did not find it. Yes, what will happen If you collect a small amount?  The project will be finalized and go through no matter what. There is no soft cap but hard cap is $12,500,000

Author: Dmitriy_support
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: 500,000,000 PM7 at a price of $0.05. - 500M PM7 – will be sold during ICO process, this money will be used according to the PLAN FOR THE UTILIZATION OF COLLECTED FUNDS.   • 150M PM7 – will be allocated to investors who started on the Seed phase 2015–2017   • 200M PM7 – will be allocated to the Company's reserve and blocked for at least 24 months. This reserve is the source of Company’s income the distribution period and can be distributed only in part and only among the direct participants and the core team, if necessary, and not earlier than after 24 months. This reserve is a necessary basis for sustainable future development of PM7.  • 136M PM7 – will be allocated to the team and advisers, and frozen by smart contract for 24-month vesting period. These PM7 will be sold from March 14, 2018 and they will be the motivation for the main team after the Distribution Period. Some PM7 from this pool (but not more than 5% of all PM7) will be allocated to non-operational advisers and will be unfrozen without the right to sell during 6 months. Up to 3% will be sent to contractors and participants of bounty-campaign without right for vesting.  • 14M PM7 goes to the Bounty program to reward users who took part in distribution the products during the ICO. They will be frozen by a smart contract with a 12-month vesting period with the right to sell from March 14, 2018. These tokens will motivate users to recommend and distribute our products.

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: Let me explain how PM7 works. You use your referral link to share information about PM7. For each friend registered by your link, you earn Installation Bonuses. They are in hold firstly. Every time your connected friends make a purchase of PM7 you will earn Commission Bonuses (up to 7%). You can withdraw them immediately. As soon as you collected $200 Commission Bonuses your $20 Installation Bonuses will be unheld. Then you can use your bonuses for purchasing PM7 and withdrawal. If nobody from your friends buy PM7 you won't be able to unhold Installation Bonuses and use them. But you can invite more friends and then they make a purchase you will earn Commission Bonuses and unhold Installation Bonuses And please, pay attention. We don't allow to buy PM7 by Installation Bonuses. This is explained simply. we build a running business and want it to generate revenue and we could share it with the owners of the tokens. Therefore, we can not just sell tokens for the given Installation Bonuses. We strive to develop the system through the purchases made by your friends. The more purchases and invitations on the network, the more we earn. We focus on longm-term income, not on one-time bonuses.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: Please, check our whitepaper for the most updated and comprehensive information about company: https://pm7.com/assets/doc/WhitePaper-en.pdf   Quote from: demidov201 on December 21, 2017, 05:58:19 PM What will happen if you don't collect the hard cap?  At the moment of ICO preparation we have already received requests from more than 50 ICO campaigns for participation in our platform. The undeniable advantage of the platform is that the required set of technical solutions for its operation has been developed and is ready for integration. We will test it at the launch of our ICO, which will allow potential investors to verify its effectiveness even before deciding to participate in PM7 platform.  Quote from: router50 on December 21, 2017, 05:52:07 PM what is special in the idea of your project?  The main idea of the platform is to reduce the distance between the creators of advanced projects and their customers, eliminating mediation of advertising, marketing and PR agencies and allow all participants in this process to create progressive and worldchanging technologies.  Quote from: dorada60 on December 21, 2017, 05:34:53 PM what are advantages of your platform over other marketing platforms?  Each participant of the system receives benefits and income from its functioning and development. PM7 owners: They receive a commission from the revenue generated automatically by their volume of PM7 events in the Premium account of the platform when distributing information about ICO campaigns and other system projects which lead to purchases or investments in these projects. They will receive income from the mathematically guaranteed growth of PM7 token price. They will receive income from personal distribution of ICO+. They will receive income from distribution of the PM7 Platform services for other projects (see the Partnership offer). Users (Agents): They will receive bonuses for distribution of ICO+ and distribution of information about different services (telecommunication, sale of tokens, gaming, betting, etc.), ICO campaigns and other types of projects. They will receive income from distribution of the PM7 Platform services for other projects (see the Partnership offer). Project Owners: They will receive an unlimited increase of users and investors participation in their projects, thereby increasing the amount of involved ICO funds. They will receive income from personal distribution of ICO+. They will receive income from distribution of the PM7 Platform services for other projects (see the Partnership offer). They will receive an income after their own ICO, which their users in other projects continue to generate. All users will remain forever in the network of our Partner. Platform service distributors: You can become our platform Services distributor. Tell your friend how we can accelerate their business. We will pay you Distribution Bonuses – additional partner commissions for each area of our platform activity. All users of the projects you bring to us will become your friends on 2nd level. Recommend us in person or by using any opportunities (see our Partnership offer).  Quote from: brahmaputra on December 21, 2017, 05:26:41 PM do you have a medium blog?  Yes, please follow https://medium.com/@pm7com

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: PM7 tokens are the internal currency of our system, and at the same time they are the indicator of entire platform and campaign value. Their value will grow along with rate of company and popularity growth.  In addition to the internal currency function the PM7 tokens is needed for event identification, and they are open-ended events.  PM7 tokens are rewarded for backers who supported crowdfunding of the PM7 platform and bought the system events. For 1 PM7 event bought during the ICO period, the backer receives 1 PM7 token.  AND  Events are subscription to certain quantity of events for generating revenue in the platform per month. The user needs them to make operations in the platform for generating income in the system. This is the capacity of the platform. 1 PM7 token is a permanent premium subscription for 1 PM7 event in the system.

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: ICO (Initial Coin Offering) is a mechanism for raising funds in terms of which future cryptocurrency is sold for current and liquid virtual or fiat money. You send ICO bitcoins, Ethereums or any other cryptocurrency, and receive tokens of a new project in return. This is another implementation of crowdfunding model, when participants finance the company's development in order to receive some benefits in the future, including the value growth of this new cryptocurrency.

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: • 1 PM7 = 0.05$ • Quantity of issued PM7 = 1,000,000,000. • 500M PM7 – will be sold during ICO, this money will be used according to the FUNDS DISTRIBUTION PLAN. • 150M PM7 – will be allocated to investors who started on the Seed phase 2015–2017 • 200M PM7 – will be allocated to the Company's reserve and blocked for at least 24months. This reserve is the source of Company’s income for the distribution period and can be distributed only in part and only among the direct participants and the core team, if necessary, and not earlier than after 24 months. This reserve is a necessary foundation for sustainable future development of PM7 Platform. • 136M PM7 – will be allocated to the team and advisers, and frozen by smart contract for 24-month period without vesting during first 6 months. These PM7 will not be immediately sold and will be motivation for the main team after the Distribution Period. Some PM7 from this pool (but not more than 5% of all PM7) will be allocated to non- operational advisers and will be unfrozen without the right to sell during 6 months. Up to 3% will be sent to contractors and participants of bounty-campaign without right for vesting. • 14M PM7 goes to the bounty program for awarding users during the ICO. They will be frozen by a smart contract with a 12-month vesting period with the right to sell from March 14, 2018. These tokens will provide motivation for users to recommend and distribute our products.

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: Beying a PM7 token holder, you become a full partner of our system, having premium accounts of 7 levels with different quantity of events per month and earning profit for unlimited growth of our system in addition to your revenue. PM7 owners receive a commission from the revenue generated automatically by their volume of PM7 events in the Premium account of the platform when distributing information about ICO campaigns and other system projects which lead to purchases or investments in these projects. They will receive income from the mathematically guaranteed growth of PM7 token price. They will receive income from personal distribution of PM7+ app. They will receive income from distribution of the PM7 Platform services for other projects (see the Partnership offer).  As for Project Owners, they will receive an unlimited increase of users and investors participation in their projects, thereby increasing the amount of involved ICO funds. They will receive income from personal distribution of PM7+ app. They will receive income from distribution of the PM7 Platform services for other projects (see the Partnership offer). They will receive an income after their own ICO, which their users in other projects continue to generate.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform

Once your friend installs the application for your link - you both get installation bonuses!  When friends of your friends install the application - you get bonuses!  When a friend invests in an ICO campaign, you will receive bonuses!  When his friends invest in the ICO campaign - you will receive bonuses!  You will always receive bonuses for the installation and purchase of friends and their friends!  And it works up to level 7 friends!

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: PM7 tokens are the internal currency of our system, and at the same time they are the indicator of entire platform and campaign value. Their value will grow along with rate of company and popularity growth. In addition to the internal currency function the PM7 tokens is needed for event identification, and they are open-ended events. PM7 tokens are rewarded for backers who supported crowdfunding of the PM7 platform and bought the system events. For 1 PM7 event bought during the ICO period, the backer receives 1 PM7 token.

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: PM7 – is decentralized innovative affiliate marketing platform, designed to radically change the advertising world for online and offline projects. We use our ready-to-use technologies as part of a well-developed professional experience in the field of MLM and transfer it to a new level by decentralization and transparency based on the blockchain technology. The PM7 platform offers the benefits of multi-level marketing (MLM) for distribution of information about ICO campaigns. The main idea is a multilevel burst-type distribution of information about projects between users by using our technical and software tools and technologies. This approach allows everyone to win. Project owners receive an intensive influx of users and investors. Besides the advantages of ICO products, users receive additional earnings for recommending the ICO campaigns and other projects to their friends.

Author: PM7 Technologies
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: Hi! Thank you for your question. You can see our fund distribution plan in our WP: https://pm7.com/assets/doc/WhitePaper-en.pdf 30% funds collected during the Distribution Period will be reserved for guaranteed redemption of PM7 tokens at 80% of the average selling price of PM7 during ICO indicated in USD, which starts on March 14, 2018. The reserve will be stored in the form of a differentiated portfolio of major cryptocurrencies. Information on the structure of the reserve and its status will be available for public. This protection will last for 12 months, and after that this reserve becomes available to the company. The tokens purchased by this way will become the property of the company. The remaining funds will be used to development of PM7 platform. 25% of collected funds will go to the company's activities and hired employees for platform development. 20% of collected funds will be allocated as premium for users and a platform for the distribution of PM7+ app and PM7 sale. Unused funds will be returned for platform development. 10% – is a payment for PR on pre-ICO, ICO and Release stages. 7% of funds – is a return of investments made by investors at the Seed Stage. 5% will be used for returning of borrowed funds used for platform creation. 3% – are bonuses for platform developers.

Author: htk00001
Title: [ANN] [ICO] PM7 – Decentralized multi-level affiliate marketing platform
Body: Marketing rules in the changing world - https://medium.com/@pm7com/marketing-rules-in-the-changing-world-890cd5508008  Even the most advanced and useful technology or invention needs information support. After all, what’s the difference, how good an idea, if no one knows about it? Let’s say that Elon Musk would fulfill his promise and send the first people to Mars in 2024. A breakthrough in space exploration? Undoubtedly, but what use of it, if everybody would know nothing about it? That’s why Mask regularly participates in various PR events, which eats up a large part of the budget of SpaceX. But this money could be more useful for other things. Almost every business in the world works in a similar way. And it does not matter, whether it’s a huge corporation, like SpaceX, or a small shop delivering organic food. If no one knows about them — business is doomed. Therefore, business reserves an enormous part of its budget, to advertise its product.  Solution  This situation is as old as capitalism itself and is aggravated every day. But the current development of technology can change everything. Specifically, the blockchain — a decentralized system that removes expensive intermediaries in various spheres of life. As for the advertising industry, the PM7 platform can revolutionize it. This is innovative marketing affiliate platform, which removes the “layer” of advertisers of all colors and allows businesses to contact directly with consumers. PM7 operates on the principle of multi-level marketing. Now the platform allows sharing an information about ICO projects. The algorithm of a platform is very simple. For example, the company wants to enter the ICO. Accordingly, she wants many people to know about it. This company contracts with PM7, which indicates how much it is willing to pay for spreading of information about its product. Users of PM7 distribute this information and thus generate a revenue system. This income is divided among all participants of PM7. So, most bonuses are getting distributors — 62% of the total. Another 31% is spent on paying bonuses to premium account holders. Between them, revenue is calculated depending on the number of tokens, which is held by premium account. The remaining 7% goes to develop the system and maintenance of its functionality.  Advance technology  The work of the PM7 platform, in fact, provides two concepts — an event and a token. PM7 event — the number of metrics, events, information sources and the possible amount of revenue in the system. The platform offers premium accounts with a different number of PM7 events per month. If the customer buys events during the ICO PM7, he receives tokens as a reward. The calculation is one-to-one. A token is a unit of measure for events. It also performs infrastructure functions. It is based on the modern standard ERC-20. Initially, this standard was developed to implement smart contracts of the Ethereum. But later due to its simplicity and reliability, it became one of the most popular token protocol for crowdfunding companies or ICO. ERC-20 — a breakthrough in the world of the blockchain. Prior to it, each ICO-token reinvented the wheel, coming up with its own versions of the basic functionality. They implemented their own functionality to exchange tokens, using a unique name and different arguments. Let`s imagine that the owner of such an “outdated” token A wanted to exchange it for the same token B. To do this, he had to study the system token B and, so, to implement compatibility for the exchange. ERC-20 is a unified protocol that avoids these complexities and allows without the difficulties. Such tokens on the ERC-20 protocol qualitatively win before tokens of the same bitcoin. After all, tokens of the most famous cryptocurrency in the world were released in limited quantities and they are becoming less available every day. At the same time, their price is unreasonably high.  More abilities  But the functions of PM7 tokens do not end with collecting money and determining the number of events. It also serves as a virtual currency. This currency will be used by projects and partners of the PM7 platform. In the future, using tokens platform users will be able to pay for services and receive bonuses. In total, the platform is going to release a billion PM7 tokens. At the same time, at a lower starting price, platform developers will sell half — 500 million tokens. One token will cost only $0.05. The remaining 500 million tokens will be shared between companies, investors, team, and advisers. Customers who receive tokens and, therefore, events, will receive commission bonuses from the system at the stage of ICO PM7 in the future. And, as the cost of the tokens themselves will increase, customers will be able to receive more revenues. Moreover, platform users will be able to freely buy and sell tokens on crypto exchanges, thereby earning money on rate fluctuations. The ICO of PM7 is scheduled for 2018. After that, the platform integrates its tokens with one of the largest crypto exchanges in the world: Exmo, Hitbtc, Tidex, Liqui. At the beginning of 2019, PM7 will receive licenses to manage funds, as well as licenses for brokerage activities from the US financial regulator SEC. This will allow PM7 to sell tokens in the world’s largest financial system. At the same time, only at the stage of preparation of ICO PM7, already more than 50 companies wanted to cooperate with the platform.
